verses.text: \w Then|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H1697"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, “Chisel \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* stone \w tablets|strong="H3871"\w* \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* originals, \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w write|strong="H3789"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w first|strong="H7223"\w* \w tablets|strong="H3871"\w*, \w which|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w broke|strong="H7665"\w*.

\w Be|strong="H1961"\w* \w ready|strong="H3559"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*, \w and|strong="H7218"\w* \w come|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w Mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Sinai|strong="H5514"\w* \w to|strong="H5927"\w* \w present|strong="H5324"\w* \w yourself|strong="H5324"\w* \w before|strong="H5921"\w* \w Me|strong="H5921"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* mountaintop.

\w No|strong="H3808"\w* \w one|strong="H3605"\w* \w may|strong="H1571"\w* \w go|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w*; \w in|strong="H6629"\w* fact, \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w one|strong="H3605"\w* \w may|strong="H1571"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* \w anywhere|strong="H3605"\w* \w on|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w*—\w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w even|strong="H1571"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w flocks|strong="H6629"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w herds|strong="H1241"\w* \w may|strong="H1571"\w* \w graze|strong="H7462"\w* \w in|strong="H6629"\w* \w front|strong="H4136"\w* \w of|strong="H2022"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w*.”

\w So|strong="H3947"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* chiseled \w out|strong="H3947"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* stone \w tablets|strong="H3871"\w* \w like|strong="H2022"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* originals. \w He|strong="H3068"\w* \w rose|strong="H7925"\w* \w early|strong="H7925"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*, \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w taking|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* stone \w tablets|strong="H3871"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*, \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w went|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w Mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Sinai|strong="H5514"\w* \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w him|strong="H3027"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w descended|strong="H3381"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w cloud|strong="H6051"\w*, \w stood|strong="H3320"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w him|strong="H7121"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w proclaimed|strong="H7121"\w* \w His|strong="H3068"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H5674"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w passed|strong="H5674"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w front|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Moses \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w out|strong="H5921"\w*: “\w The|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w compassionate|strong="H7349"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w gracious|strong="H2587"\w*, slow \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w anger|strong="H6440"\w*, \w abounding|strong="H7227"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* loving \w devotion|strong="H2617"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w faithfulness|strong="H2617"\w*,

maintaining loving \w devotion|strong="H2617"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* thousand generations,\f + \fr 34:7 \ft Hebrew to thousands\f* \w forgiving|strong="H5375"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w*, \w transgression|strong="H6588"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w sin|strong="H2403"\w*. \w Yet|strong="H3808"\w* \w He|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H1121"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w means|strong="H5352"\w* \w leave|strong="H5352"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w guilty|strong="H5771"\w* \w unpunished|strong="H5352"\w*; \w He|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H1121"\w* \w visit|strong="H6485"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* fathers \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H5375"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w grandchildren|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w third|strong="H8029"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w fourth|strong="H7256"\w* generations.”

\w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w immediately|strong="H4116"\w* \w bowed|strong="H7812"\w* \w down|strong="H7812"\w* \w to|strong="H4116"\w* \w the|strong="H4872"\w* ground \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w worshiped|strong="H7812"\w*.

“\w O|strong="H3068"\w* Lord,” \w he|strong="H1931"\w* said, “\w if|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H5869"\w* \w indeed|strong="H3588"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w favor|strong="H2580"\w* \w in|strong="H3212"\w* \w Your|strong="H3588"\w* \w sight|strong="H5869"\w*, \w my|strong="H3588"\w* Lord, \w please|strong="H4994"\w* \w go|strong="H3212"\w* \w with|strong="H3212"\w* \w us|strong="H4994"\w*. \w Although|strong="H3588"\w* \w this|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* stiff-necked \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w forgive|strong="H5545"\w* \w our|strong="H3588"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w* \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w sin|strong="H2403"\w*, \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w take|strong="H5157"\w* \w us|strong="H4994"\w* \w as|strong="H3588"\w* \w Your|strong="H3588"\w* \w inheritance|strong="H5157"\w*.” The LORD Renews the Covenant (2 Corinthians 3:7–18)

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* said, “\w Behold|strong="H2009"\w*, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* \w making|strong="H6213"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w*. \w Before|strong="H5048"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w perform|strong="H6213"\w* \w wonders|strong="H6381"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w never|strong="H3808"\w* \w been|strong="H1254"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w nation|strong="H1471"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* world. \w All|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w among|strong="H7130"\w* \w whom|strong="H5971"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w live|strong="H7130"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*’s \w work|strong="H4639"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w an|strong="H6213"\w* \w awesome|strong="H3372"\w* \w thing|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* \w doing|strong="H6213"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*.

\w Observe|strong="H8104"\w* what \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w command|strong="H6680"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w this|strong="H6440"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*. \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3117"\w* \w drive|strong="H1644"\w* \w out|strong="H1644"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* Amorites, \w Canaanites|strong="H3669"\w*, \w Hittites|strong="H2850"\w*, \w Perizzites|strong="H6522"\w*, \w Hivites|strong="H2340"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w Jebusites|strong="H2983"\w*.

\w Be|strong="H1961"\w* \w careful|strong="H8104"\w* \w not|strong="H6435"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w make|strong="H3772"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w treaty|strong="H1285"\w* \f + \fr 34:12 \ft Forms of the Hebrew berit are translated in most passages as covenant.\f* \w with|strong="H1285"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w land|strong="H7130"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w are|strong="H1961"\w* entering, \w lest|strong="H6435"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w become|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w snare|strong="H4170"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w midst|strong="H7130"\w*.

\w Rather|strong="H3588"\w*, \w you|strong="H3588"\w* must \w tear|strong="H5422"\w* \w down|strong="H5422"\w* \w their|strong="H3588"\w* \w altars|strong="H4196"\w*, \w smash|strong="H7665"\w* \w their|strong="H3588"\w* sacred stones, \w and|strong="H4196"\w* chop \w down|strong="H5422"\w* \w their|strong="H3588"\w* Asherah poles.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w must|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w worship|strong="H7812"\w* \w any|strong="H7812"\w* other \w god|strong="H3068"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w whose|strong="H8034"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jealous|strong="H7067"\w*, \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w jealous|strong="H7067"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*.

Do \w not|strong="H6435"\w* \w make|strong="H3772"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* \w with|strong="H1285"\w* \w the|strong="H7121"\w* \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H7121"\w* land, \w for|strong="H7121"\w* \w when|strong="H3427"\w* \w they|strong="H1285"\w* \w prostitute|strong="H2181"\w* \w themselves|strong="H7121"\w* \w to|strong="H7121"\w* \w their|strong="H3772"\w* gods \w and|strong="H1285"\w* \w sacrifice|strong="H2077"\w* \w to|strong="H7121"\w* \w them|strong="H7121"\w*, \w they|strong="H1285"\w* \w will|strong="H3427"\w* \w invite|strong="H7121"\w* \w you|strong="H6435"\w*, \w and|strong="H1285"\w* \w you|strong="H6435"\w* \w will|strong="H3427"\w* eat \w their|strong="H3772"\w* \w sacrifices|strong="H2077"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w when|strong="H1121"\w* \w you|strong="H3947"\w* \w take|strong="H3947"\w* some \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w their|strong="H3947"\w* \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* \w as|strong="H1121"\w* brides \w for|strong="H1121"\w* \w your|strong="H3947"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, \w their|strong="H3947"\w* \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* \w will|strong="H1121"\w* \w prostitute|strong="H2181"\w* themselves \w to|strong="H1121"\w* \w their|strong="H3947"\w* gods \w and|strong="H1121"\w* cause \w your|strong="H3947"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H1121"\w* do \w the|strong="H3947"\w* same.
\w You|strong="H6213"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w molten|strong="H4541"\w* gods \w for|strong="H6213"\w* yourselves.

\w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Feast|strong="H2282"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w Unleavened|strong="H4682"\w* \w Bread|strong="H4682"\w*.\f + \fr 34:18 \ft That is, the seven-day period after the Passover during which no leaven may be eaten; see Exodus 12:14–20.\f* \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w at|strong="H2320"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w appointed|strong="H4150"\w* \w time|strong="H3117"\w* \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* Abib,\f + \fr 34:18 \ft Abib was the first month of the ancient Hebrew lunar calendar, usually occurring within the months of March and April; twice in this verse.\f* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* eat \w unleavened|strong="H4682"\w* \w bread|strong="H4682"\w* \w as|strong="H3117"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*. \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* Abib \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w came|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w first|strong="H6363"\w* \w offspring|strong="H6363"\w* \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w womb|strong="H7358"\w* belongs \w to|strong="H2142"\w* \w Me|strong="H2142"\w*, \w including|strong="H3605"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w firstborn|strong="H6363"\w* males among \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w livestock|strong="H4735"\w*, whether \w cattle|strong="H4735"\w* \w or|strong="H7794"\w* \w sheep|strong="H7716"\w*.

\w You|strong="H6440"\w* \w must|strong="H1121"\w* \w redeem|strong="H6299"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w donkey|strong="H2543"\w* \w with|strong="H6440"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w lamb|strong="H7716"\w*; \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w if|strong="H7200"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w do|strong="H3605"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w redeem|strong="H6299"\w* \w it|strong="H7200"\w*, \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H6440"\w* \w break|strong="H6202"\w* \w its|strong="H3605"\w* \w neck|strong="H6202"\w*. \w You|strong="H6440"\w* \w must|strong="H1121"\w* \w redeem|strong="H6299"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*. \w No|strong="H3808"\w* \w one|strong="H3605"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w appear|strong="H7200"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w Me|strong="H6440"\w* \w empty-handed|strong="H7387"\w*.

\w Six|strong="H8337"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w you|strong="H3117"\w* \w shall|strong="H3117"\w* \w labor|strong="H5647"\w*, \w but|strong="H3117"\w* \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H5647"\w* \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w you|strong="H3117"\w* \w shall|strong="H3117"\w* \w rest|strong="H7673"\w*; even \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H5647"\w* seasons \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w plowing|strong="H2758"\w* \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w harvesting|strong="H7105"\w*, \w you|strong="H3117"\w* must \w rest|strong="H7673"\w*.

\w And|strong="H6213"\w* \w you|strong="H6213"\w* \w are|strong="H8141"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w celebrate|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w Feast|strong="H2282"\w* \w of|strong="H8141"\w* \w Weeks|strong="H7620"\w* \f + \fr 34:22 \ft That is, Shavuot, the late spring feast of pilgrimage to Jerusalem; it is also known as the Feast of Harvest (see Exodus 23:16) or the Feast of Pentecost (see Acts 2:1).\f* \w with|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w firstfruits|strong="H1061"\w* \w of|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w wheat|strong="H2406"\w* \w harvest|strong="H7105"\w*, \w and|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w Feast|strong="H2282"\w* \w of|strong="H8141"\w* Ingathering \f + \fr 34:22 \ft That is, Sukkot, the autumn feast of pilgrimage to Jerusalem; it is later called the Feast of Tabernacles (or Booths or Shelters).\f* \w at|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w turn|strong="H8622"\w* \w of|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w*.

\w Three|strong="H7969"\w* \w times|strong="H6471"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w males|strong="H2138"\w* \w are|strong="H3478"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w appear|strong="H7200"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w GOD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.
